alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 7:25PM MDT until August 01 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Todd County in south central South Dakota... East central Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 815 PM MDT/915 PM CDT/. * At 725 PM MDT/825 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located over Harrington, or 23 miles east of Martin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Upper Cut Meat, Vetal and Harrington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
